Text: RE Possible new lease memberI agree we started out with went to no we are going in the wrong direction again By the way wasnt Mertz supposed to add more acreage to this ranch I think we have hunted everything we can on ol Autry Chris McComb PE McComb Construction Co Inc VP Business Development Original Message From chad knipe mailto Sent Tuesday March AM To Keith McComb Brian Constantine EriK Wollam Chris McComb Joe Parks Subject Re Possible new lease member Wait a minute lets think about this We already have one attorney on the lease can we handle another Were gonna need a bigger ranch Original Message From Keith McComb Sent Tuesday March AM To Brian Constantine Erik Wollam Subject RE Possible new lease member If he buys the first keg hes in Original Message From Brian Constantine mailto Sent Monday March AM To Erik Wollam Subject RE Possible new lease member Think this a great ideahe is just the ideal person to have on the lease and as standup and nice of a guy you would ever want to know Id give him a bid right away BC Original Message From Erik Wollam mailto Sent Monday March AM To Brian Constantine Subject Possible new lease member Deer All I have a person that might fit what we are looking for in the th spot or to fill a gap left by Joe who is currently unable to provide a firm response BJ Johnson Played football with Chad and I at Jesuit Was a year a head of us Met Zander at UH in College and hung with he and Brian while they were rooming together Went to lawschool a few years after me Is out and doing well with at a well known plaintiffs lawfirm Nice guy He mentioned a year or so ago to call him if we ever had a spot His dad used to take him hunting and BJ wants to return the favor Looking for a place he could take his dad once or twice a year just to get out there not to shoot deer He has two small girls is busier than I am and would go no more than the rest of the Houston boys He is a good guy Dont know much about his deer hunting experience but I dont care about that Chad and Brian give him the stamp of approval My thought is we could proceed as set with Chris and I splitting the th spot but if Joe winds up taking a job out of state which is a possibility we would be left with two spots to fill and less time to do it I think it might be best to offer this spot to BJ and fill up all spots then if we lose Joe Chris and I can be the fall back plan Thoughts and comments from the McComb guys please Erik Send and receive Hotmail on your mobile device

RE JOE IS A DEER HUNTING SUPERSTARpst I think we need to get a platform built at the ridge of the barn it already has power so we would just have to get someone to carry a fridge up there Chris McComb PE McComb Construction Co Inc VP Business Development Original Message From Keith McComb mailto Sent Monday May PM To Erik Wollam Subject RE JOE IS A DEER HUNTING SUPERSTAR Yeah Im thinking that a two story dbl wide with the ladder enclosed is the best way to go Chairs and hunting window up with door and relaxing area down Maybe even a spot for a fridge Original Message From Erik Wollam mailto Sent Monday May PM To Subject RE JOE IS A DEER HUNTING SUPERSTAR Kinda makes me think about hunting Keith you and the boys going to build a new box re last email report From Parks Joe To Brian Constantine Erik Wollam Subject RE JOE IS A DEER HUNTING SUPERSTAR Date Mon May mertzindexhtm mertzindexhtm the actual link no wonder he didnt give me the picture back Original Message From Brian Constantine mailto Sent Monday May PM To Erik Wollam Parks Joe Subject JOE IS A DEER HUNTING SUPERSTAR Gentlemen Please access wwwmertzranchcom and witness my photographic skills and Joes obvious hunting skills as a picture of Joes point is being proudly displayed on Michaels website Methinks using Joes deer and my photographical skills as a shameless plug for Michaels ever expanding Outfitting Monopolyshould grant us hunter and photographer certain royalties normally associated with this sort of unlicensed usage of this form of media Basically we need a price break for use of picture Anyway pretty cool seeing your very own photo displayed on a website PIGGY This email is the property of Bridgeline Holdings LP andor its relevant affiliates and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipients Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Bridgeline Holdings LP or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Join the worlds largest email service with MSN Hotmail

On the Hoof Scoringpst Go to wwwbowsitecom and play their Field Judging Game for scoring deer in the field This sure beats working Chris McComb PE McComb Construction Co Inc VP Business Development

pst We are pleased to announce that our son Clay Grider McComb was born on January He weighed pounds ounces and was inches long We got home from the hospital Friday afternoon and he and his mother are doing great Chris McComb PE McComb Construction Co Inc VP Business Development

RE JOE IS A DEER HUNTING SUPERSTARpst gray box the closest escape to Mertz HQ Chris McComb PE McComb Construction Co Inc VP Business Development Original Message From Parks Joe mailto Sent Monday May PM To Brian Constantine Erik Wollam Subject RE JOE IS A DEER HUNTING SUPERSTAR where did mertz shoot his Original Message From Brian Constantine mailto Sent Monday May PM To Erik Wollam Parks Joe Subject JOE IS A DEER HUNTING SUPERSTAR Gentlemen Please access wwwmertzranchcom and witness my photographic skills and Joes obvious hunting skills as a picture of Joes point is being proudly displayed on Michaels website Methinks using Joes deer and my photographical skills as a shameless plug for Michaels ever expanding Outfitting Monopolyshould grant us hunter and photographer certain royalties normally associated with this sort of unlicensed usage of this form of media Basically we need a price break for use of picture Anyway pretty cool seeing your very own photo displayed on a website PIGGY This email is the property of Bridgeline Holdings LP andor its relevant affiliates and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipients Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Bridgeline Holdings LP or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE Good News Lease SignedLets see what else I can break over the next years Chris McComb PE McComb Construction Co Inc VP Business Development Original Message From Erik Wollam mailto Sent Wednesday June PM To Subject Good News Lease Signed Well you never know Got back into the office today after taking two days off with Sheila and family in Fredricksburg to find a thick envelope from Mertz Ranch Company buried in my in box Did not know what to expect had visions of Mertz mailing it back with a note saying forget it Instead the lease was signed and dated and had a nice note saying thanks Go figure Weve got a lease for four more years Same deal same contract as the last three years just K more a year Price remains the same this year next year it is k a year per spot and we will need to add one spot Still waiting on Chet Would like to know who McCombs would suggest if Chet does not commit Lease requires Mertz to spent k a year on protien feed He and I can agree in writing to reduce or increase that amount with a corresponding reduction or increase in lease cost Term is April to April exclusive right to hunt turkey and deer spring turkey starting the third weekend in april Im pleased Hope you are too Erik Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at
